resources.string: Let\'s start hydrating! \nGrab a glass of water and take a refreshing sip.
Great job! \nYou\'re on your way to staying hydrated.
Three glasses down, and you\'re doing fantastic! \nKeep that water intake flowing
You\'re halfway there! \nFour glasses of water is an excellent achievement.
Five glasses! \nYour body thanks you for staying hydrated.
Five glasses! \nYour body thanks you for staying hydrated.
Six glasses in! \nYou\'re really taking care of yourself now.
Lucky number seven! \nStay hydrated and keep up the good work!
Congratulations! You\'ve reached the daily goal of 8 glasses of water. \nYou\'re a hydration superstar!
You\'re going above and beyond. \nHydration level: Expert.
